languages.text: Следы бывшего арбитра теряются во тьме истории. Изгнанный с позором, он боле никогда не появлялся на мирах фон Валанциус и не искал себе покровителя в других системах. Спустя век некий пустотный странник поведал, что нашел неизвестный мир на окраине Простора и безымянную могилу, над которой, точно надгробие, высился металлический остов кибернетизированного зверя.

All traces of the former Arbitrator have been lost in the darkness of history. Following his summary expulsion, he never set foot on a von Valancius world again, nor did he seek out a patron in other systems. A century later, a void wanderer was heard speaking of an uncharted world on the outskirts of the Expanse, where one could find an unmarked grave alongside the metal frame of a cybernetic animal, which stood over it like a headstone.
languages.original_text: Следы бывшего арбитра теряются во тьме истории. Изгнанный с позором, он боле никогда не появлялся на мирах фон Валанциус и не искал себе покровителя в других системах. Спустя век некий пустотный странник поведал, что нашел неизвестный мир на окраине Простора и безымянную могилу, над которой, точно надгробие, высился металлический остов кибернетизированного зверя.

traits.locale_text: The former Arbitrator's traces are lost in the darkness of history. Summarily expelled, he never set foot on a von Valancius world again, and never sought a patron in other systems. A century later, a void wanderer spoke of having found an uncharted world on the outskirts of the Expanse that had a nameless grave above which the metal frame of a cybernetic animal stood like a headstone.

A century later, a void wanderer spoke of having found an uncharted world on the outskirts of the Expanse that had a nameless grave above which the metal frame of a cybernetic animal stood like a headstone.

All traces of the former Arbitrator have been lost in the darkness of history. Following his summary expulsion, he never set foot on a von Valancius world again, nor did he seek out a patron in other systems. A century later, a void wanderer was heard speaking of an uncharted world on the outskirts of the Expanse, where one could find an unmarked grave alongside the metal frame of a cybernetic animal, which stood over it like a headstone.

Following his summary expulsion, he never set foot on a von Valancius world again, nor did he seek out a patron in other systems. A century later, a void wanderer was heard speaking of an uncharted world on the outskirts of the Expanse, where one could find an unmarked grave alongside the metal frame of a cybernetic animal, which stood over it like a headstone.

languages.text: Alls Spuren des früheren Arbitrators sind in der Dunkelheit der Geschichte verschollen. Nach seinem Ausschluss setzte er nie wieder einen Fuß auf eine Valancius-Welt und suchte auch keinen Förderer in anderen Systemen. Ein Jahrhundert später erzählte ein Leerenwanderer von einer nicht kartografierten Welt am Rand der Ausdehnung, auf der ein anonymes Grab zu finden war – neben dem Metallgerippe eines kybernetischen Tiers, das sich darüber erhob wie ein Grabstein.
languages.original_text: All traces of the former Arbitrator have been lost in the darkness of history. Following his summary expulsion, he never set foot on a von Valancius world again, nor did he seek out a patron in other systems. A century later, a void wanderer was heard speaking of an uncharted world on the outskirts of the Expanse, where one could find an unmarked grave alongside the metal frame of a cybernetic animal, which stood over it like a headstone.

traits.locale_text: Alls Spuren des früheren Arbitrators sind in der Dunkelheit der Geschichte verschollen. Nach seinem Ausschluss setzte er nie wieder einen Fuß auf eine Valancius-Welt und suchte auch keinen Förderer in anderen Systemen. Ein Jahrhundert später erzählte ein Leerenwanderer von einer nicht kartografierten Welt am Rand der Ausdehnung, auf der ein anonymes Grab zu finden war – neben dem Metallgerippe eines kybernetischen Tiers, das sich darüber erhob wie ein Grabstein.

languages.text: Toute trace de l'ancien arbitrator s'est perdue dans les ténèbres de l'histoire. Suite à son expulsion sommaire, nul ne le vit jamais remettre les pieds sur un monde von Valancius ni chercher de protecteur dans d'autre système. Un siècle plus tard, un voyageur mentionna un monde inexploré aux abords des Étendues, sur lequel il avait trouvé l'armature cybernétique d'un animal qui se dressait telle une pierre tombale sur une sépulture sans nom.
languages.original_text: All traces of the former Arbitrator have been lost in the darkness of history. Following his summary expulsion, he never set foot on a von Valancius world again, nor did he seek out a patron in other systems. A century later, a void wanderer was heard speaking of an uncharted world on the outskirts of the Expanse, where one could find an unmarked grave alongside the metal frame of a cybernetic animal, which stood over it like a headstone.

traits.locale_text: Toute trace de l'ancien arbitrator s'est perdue dans les ténèbres de l'histoire. Suite à son expulsion sommaire, nul ne le vit jamais remettre les pieds sur un monde von Valancius ni chercher de protecteur dans d'autre système. Un siècle plus tard, un voyageur mentionna un monde inexploré aux abords des Étendues, sur lequel il avait trouvé l'armature cybernétique d'un animal qui se dressait telle une pierre tombale sur une sépulture sans nom.

languages.text: 这位前任法务官的一切踪迹，都消失在历史的黑暗之中。当索罗蒙被行商浪人驱逐出境后，他再也没有回到过冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的领土，也没有前往其他星系寻求庇护。一百年后，有人听到某个流浪者提到科罗努斯扩区外围的某个未知世界。据说，那里有一座没有任何印记的坟墓，坟墓前矗立着一具机械动物的金属框架，仿佛墓碑一般。
languages.original_text: All traces of the former Arbitrator have been lost in the darkness of history. Following his summary expulsion, he never set foot on a von Valancius world again, nor did he seek out a patron in other systems. A century later, a void wanderer was heard speaking of an uncharted world on the outskirts of the Expanse, where one could find an unmarked grave alongside the metal frame of a cybernetic animal, which stood over it like a headstone.

traits.locale_text: 这位前任法务官的一切踪迹，都消失在历史的黑暗之中。当索罗蒙被行商浪人驱逐出境后，他再也没有回到过冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的领土，也没有前往其他星系寻求庇护。一百年后，有人听到某个流浪者提到科罗努斯扩区外围的某个未知世界。据说，那里有一座没有任何印记的坟墓，坟墓前矗立着一具机械动物的金属框架，仿佛墓碑一般。

languages.text: Todo rastro del antiguo Arbitrator se ha perdido entre las sombras de la historia. Tras su expulsión sumaria, nunca volvió a pisar un mundo von Valancius ni buscó una posición en otros sistemas. Un siglo después, un viajero del vacío habló de un mundo inexplorado a las afueras de la Extensión, donde se encontraba una tumba sin identificar bajo el esqueleto metálico de un animal cibernético, que la cubría como una lápida.
languages.original_text: All traces of the former Arbitrator have been lost in the darkness of history. Following his summary expulsion, he never set foot on a von Valancius world again, nor did he seek out a patron in other systems. A century later, a void wanderer was heard speaking of an uncharted world on the outskirts of the Expanse, where one could find an unmarked grave alongside the metal frame of a cybernetic animal, which stood over it like a headstone.

traits.locale_text: Todo rastro del antiguo Arbitrator se ha perdido entre las sombras de la historia. Tras su expulsión sumaria, nunca volvió a pisar un mundo von Valancius ni buscó una posición en otros sistemas. Un siglo después, un viajero del vacío habló de un mundo inexplorado a las afueras de la Extensión, donde se encontraba una tumba sin identificar bajo el esqueleto metálico de un animal cibernético, que la cubría como una lápida.

languages.text: 元アービトレイターの痕跡は、歴史の闇の中に消え去った。即時追放の後、彼が再びフォン・ヴァランシウス家の惑星に足を踏み入れることはなく、他の星系で後ろ盾を求めることもなかった。百年後、ある虚空をさすらう者が、エクスパンスの辺境にある未踏の惑星について語ったという話が聞かれた。そこには無印の墓と、その上に墓標のように立つサイバネティックな動物のメタルフレームがあったらしい。
languages.original_text: All traces of the former Arbitrator have been lost in the darkness of history. Following his summary expulsion, he never set foot on a von Valancius world again, nor did he seek out a patron in other systems. A century later, a void wanderer was heard speaking of an uncharted world on the outskirts of the Expanse, where one could find an unmarked grave alongside the metal frame of a cybernetic animal, which stood over it like a headstone.

traits.locale_text: 元アービトレイターの痕跡は、歴史の闇の中に消え去った。即時追放の後、彼が再びフォン・ヴァランシウス家の惑星に足を踏み入れることはなく、他の星系で後ろ盾を求めることもなかった。百年後、ある虚空をさすらう者が、エクスパンスの辺境にある未踏の惑星について語ったという話が聞かれた。そこには無印の墓と、その上に墓標のように立つサイバネティックな動物のメタルフレームがあったらしい。

languages.text: Eski Yargıcı'dan kalan tüm izler, tarihin karanlığına gömülüp kayboldu. Apar topar kovulmasının ardından bir daha asla hiçbir von Valancius dünyasına ayak basmadı. Diğer sistemlerde başka bir hami aramaya da kalkışmadı. Bir yüzyıl sonra bir uçsuz gezgininin, Enginlik'in dış civarlarında bulunan keşfedilmemiş bir dünyadan bahsettiği duyuldu. Burada bir mezar taşını andıran sibernetik bir hayvanın metal iskeletiyle beraber isimsiz bir mezar olduğu söyleniyordu.
languages.original_text: All traces of the former Arbitrator have been lost in the darkness of history. Following his summary expulsion, he never set foot on a von Valancius world again, nor did he seek out a patron in other systems. A century later, a void wanderer was heard speaking of an uncharted world on the outskirts of the Expanse, where one could find an unmarked grave alongside the metal frame of a cybernetic animal, which stood over it like a headstone.

traits.locale_text: Eski Yargıcı'dan kalan tüm izler tarihin karanlığına gömülüp kayboldu. Apar topar kovulmasının ardından bir daha asla hiçbir von Valancius dünyasına ayak basmadı. Diğer sistemlerde başka bir hami aramaya da kalkışmadı. Bir yüzyıl sonra bir uçsuz gezgininin, Enginlik'in dış civarlarında bulunan keşfedilmemiş bir dünyadan bahsettiği duyuldu. Burada, bir mezar taşını andıran sibernetik bir hayvanın metal iskeletiyle beraber isimsiz bir mezar olduğu söyleniyordu.
